author: USA TODAY, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus 'is the Big One … I hope never to see bigger': Harvard epidemiologist
description: When will social distancing and self-isolation end? Will opening society contribute to second wave of disease? Scientist Marc Lipsitch tells us.
content:
Dr. Marc Lipsitch, a Harvard epidemiologist, talks about coming stressors on the health care system from coronavirus and loosening control measures.
USA TODAY
As daily coronavirus-related deaths reached new highs in New York and nationally, USA TODAYs Edito… [+15035 chars]
